name: The Old Ones (Yuting Han ｜｜ 韩雨婷)
name_original: The Old Ones (Yuting Han ｜｜ 韩雨婷)
description:
Our story:

Fight an ancient monster in an old library, taking inspiration from the 1920s art styles and H.P. Lovecraft’s literary works. Dive into this secret society of occult agents, learn the skills required to become an Eldritch Hunter, and fight The Old Ones, without going insane.

How to play:

  • Xbox Controller:
    • Left stick for movement
    • A button / Right Trigger to Slash 
    • X button / Left Trigger to Dash
  • Mouse & Keyboard:
    • Left click or space to Slash
    • Right-click or shift to Dash
    • WASD Movement
